iLoveMakonnen – “Swerve (Prod. Mike WiLL Made It)”

posted by Joyce on December 14, 2014 in Audio

Image via SoundCloud

iLoveMakonnen keeps the momentum going, wrapping up the year with a brand new single. “Swerve” sees Makonnen at his most whimsical over a hypnotic Mike WiLL Made It beat. Listen to “Serve” below.

Tags:  ilovemakonnen, Mike Will Made It
